word_mean: 氡：放射性重元素，无色气体，符号为Rn，原子量222，原子序数86，镭分裂而成，用于放射治疗。参见radium。219Rn是放射性锕族的放射性同位素，220Rn是放射性钍族的放射性同位素

sentence.Network_en: Radon is known to be harmful to humans in large quantities.
sentence.Network_cn: 众所周知，大量的氡会对人体造成伤害。

sentence.Network_en: There is an acknowledged risk of lung cancer from radon.
sentence.Network_cn: 氡被认为有诱发肺癌的危险。

sentence.Network_en: Radon is the daughter of radium.

氡气（Radon），是存在于大自然中的有害气体，因为含有放射线，所以估计在美国有26％的肺癌是它所引起的。到底氡气是什么呢？

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from radium, on the pattern of argon

entry.def: Radon is a radioactive element in the form of a gas.

means.word_mean: 1. a radioactive gaseous element formed by the disintegration of radium; the heaviest of the inert gasses; occurs naturally (especially in areas over granite) and is considered a hazard to health
